newsitem.title: USA: Innovex plans $16 mln Minnesota plant.
newsitem.headline: Innovex plans $16 mln Minnesota plant.

text.p: Innovex Inc said Tuesday its precision components division will spend about $16 to build a 50,000 square foot manufacturing facility in Litchfield, Minn. to produce flexible circuit products.
Construction of the facility will begin next month, and manufacturing will begin about January 1, 1998.

Innovex said it expects to invest about $16 million in the new facility over the next 12 to 24 months. This expansion could add an additional 100 jobs in the Litchfield area over the next three years. Innovex currently employs more than 1,000 people in the state of Minnesota.
